figureCitation.captionText: FIGURE 2. Morphological features of Orophyllus montanus. A) frons in fronto-ventral view B) head and pronotum in dorsal view C) pronotum in lateral view D) sterna in ventral view E) end of the right tegmina in ventral view F) apex of male abdomen in dorsal view G) male subgenital plate in ventral view H) left hind femora in dorsal view I) female subgenital plate in ventral view J) ovipositor in lateral view. A, B, C, D, F, G, H: male; E, I, J: female. Scale bar= 2mm.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 2. Morphological features of
Orophyllus montanus
. A) frons in fronto-ventral view B) head and pronotum in dorsal view C) pronotum in lateral view D) sterna in ventral view E) end of the right tegmina in ventral view F) apex of male abdomen in dorsal view G) male subgenital plate in ventral view H) left hind femora in dorsal view I) female subgenital plate in ventral view J) ovipositor in lateral view. A, B, C, D, F, G, H: male; E, I, J: female. Scale bar= 2mm.
